title: Fullscreen not working
body:
So this morning I wanted to watch netflix as I was playing League, so I went to windowed mode. For some reason, my game client went super small (almost as small as my steam friends list and everytime I tried reverting it back, it would completely revert my whole settings (FPS cap, anti-aliasing, graphics, etc) When I finally did manage to get it into fullscreen I could not move my screen. It was stuck in the same position and I couldn't make it pan even when I went into free cam

replies.body:
Something may have gone wrong with your config files that are causing the league window dimensions to go a little.....screwy to say the least. Let's try resetting those config files and that should force it to reset back to default. 

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Let me know if that helps!
